original_text: The Lord says, ‘Some men in Edom know what is right. But, at that time, I will kill them. 1: The people in Edom were descendants of Esau. The Israelites were descendants of Jacob. Jacob and Esau were brothers. Some men in the mountains know what is good. (These are the mountains where Esau's people live.) But I will kill those men. The Lord says, ‘Some men in Edom know what is right. But, at that time, I will kill them. 1: The people in Edom were descendants of Esau. The Israelites were descendants of Jacob. Jacob and Esau were brothers. Some men in the mountains know what is good. (These are the mountains where Esau's people live.) But I will kill those men. The Lord says,
korean_text: 여호와의 말씀이니라 그 날에 내가 에돔에서 지혜 있는 자를 멸하며 에서의 산에서 지각 있는 자를 멸하지 아니하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Some men in Edom know what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 에돔의 어떤 사람들은 옳은 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: But, at that time, I will kill them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그때 내가 그들을 죽일 것이다

sentences.original_text: The people in Edom were descendants of Esau
The Israelites were descendants of Jacob
Some men in the mountains know what is good
sentences.korean_translation: 산에 있는 어떤 사람들은 선한 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: These are the mountains where Esau's people live
But I will kill those men
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 그 남자들을 죽일 것이다

sentences.original_text: Some men in Edom know what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 에돔의 어떤 사람들은 옳은 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: But, at that time, I will kill them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그때 내가 그들을 죽일 것이다

sentences.original_text: The people in Edom were descendants of Esau
The Israelites were descendants of Jacob
Some men in the mountains know what is good
sentences.korean_translation: 산에 있는 어떤 사람들은 선한 것을 안다

sentences.original_text: These are the mountains where Esau's people live
But I will kill those men
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 그 남자들을 죽일 것이다
